content.question: Using the data in the table, construct a cladogram on the template provided to indicate the most likely evolutionary relationships among the different mammals. Indicate on the cladogram where each of the characters most likey arose in the evolutionary process, and justify the placement of the characters on the cladogram.

frqParts.text: Using the data in the table, construct a cladogram on the template provided to indicate the most likely evolutionary relationships among the different mammals. skill.text: 2.D: Represent relationships within biological models, including mathematical models, diagrams, flowcharts, and systems.
